DOC.brief_summary: Most study labour induction misoprostol use dose high 25mg interval 3-4 hour . We study low-dose regime 25mg misoprostol compare efficacy single dose double dose dose interval 6 hour current regime 3 mg dinoprostone pessary .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Of Misoprostol And Dinoprostone Vaginal Pessaries Cervical Priming ( TROMAD Study )
DOC.detailed_description: 171 woman singleton term pregnancy modify Bishop score ( mBS ) ≤ 5 recruit randomized 3 arm : current dinoprostone regime , double dose misoprostol single dose misoprostol . The primary outcome number woman achieve favourable mBS > 6 active labour Day 2 . Secondary outcome time interval insert active labour delivery , abnormal uterine activity , delivery method adverse neonatal outcome .
DOC.criteria: singleton pregnancy , cephalic presentation , gestation great 37 complete week , know contraindication vaginal delivery , Bishop score≤5 . previous caesarean section uterine surgery , significant maternal medical/obstetric complication pregnancy ( severe preeclampsia , significant antepartum haemorrhage ) , antepartum evidence fetal compromise ( fetal growth restriction ) , previous attempt cervical priming , contraindication receiving prostaglandin , include asthma glaucoma .
